| Broader Location | Specific Location | Whether the Broader Location contains the Specific Location |
| --- | --- | --- |

In this paragraph, "The Times" is a broader location that encompasses the more specific location of "The Times's puzzle editor." The puzzle editor is a part of The Times, so the relationship is that The Times contains the puzzle editor.
